mapper.select: select count(*) from (select * from review join member on (review_member_no = member_no) where member_id=#{memberId})

select * from (select rownum as rnum, r.* from (select review_no, review_member_no, review_product_no, product_name, review_title, review_read_count, to_char(review_date,'yyyy.mm.dd')review_date from review join member on (member_no = review_member_no) join product on (product_no = review_product_no) where member_id=#{memberId} order by 1 desc)r) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
